meta.title: Fox Point-Bayside School District - COVID- 19 Updates

link.title: COVID- 19 Updates - Fox Point-Bayside School District
COVID- 19 Updates - Fox Point-Bayside School District

div.h2: District closed Monday, March 16, 2020 until the e...

div.div:
District closed Monday, March 16, 2020 until the end of the 2019-20 school year
As part of the Safer at Home Order, all public and private K-12 schools will remain closed for student instruction and extracurricular activities for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year, but can continue to facilitate virtual learning and food distribution for students. Please see the COVID-19 page for additional updates and resources during this closure.

tr.td: Bayside Parent/ Guardians: If your child's device needs repair due to accidental damage, or if you have received an email notifying you that their assigned device is available for pickup, please fill out the Bayside Chromebook Repair/Loaner Request Form to confirm your time. All requests must be made by Monday evening. We will only have a staff member onsite at Bayside on Tuesday's from 8:45am- 11:15am to facilitate the chromebook drop off and assignment of loaner devices. Please remember to bring the chromebook and charger once you request a time on the form.
